cinematics.name: Zarathax Awakens
cinematics.camera_work: Slow pan through Obsidian Caverns, close-up on dragon's eye opening, dramatic pullback to full dragon silhouette
key_moments: Dragon's first words echoing like thunder
cinematics.transitions: Fade from dragon eye to first-person view of Mirana watching mountain

cinematics.name: Dragon Knights Arrive
cinematics.trigger: After Mirana and Kael reach Zarathax
cinematics.camera_work: Tracking shot following Dragon Knights marching into frame, over-the-shoulder of Seraphina, quick cuts between tense faces

cinematics.name: Mordren's Betrayal
cinematics.camera_work: Low angle shot of Mordren stepping from shadows, close-up on blacing mark, dramatic upward tilt as he summons Shadowfiends
cinematics.lighting: Necrotic energy illuminates scene with dark purple glow
cinematics.vfx: Black mark pulses with energy, shadows coalesce into creatures

cinematics.name: Sunfire Discovery
cinematics.trigger: Kael combines fire magic with holy light
cinematics.camera_work: Slow motion shot of Kael's fire meeting Mirana's light, swirling camera as energies merge, blinding white flash
cinematics.vfx: Fire and light swirl together, shadows burn away

cross_ref.name: Sunfire
cross_ref.note: New magic type discovered during battle

cinematics.name: Ancient History Revealed
cinematics.camera_work: Static wide shot of ruins, slow zoom on Zarathax as he speaks, flash images of ancient war (10,000 years ago)
flashback_sequences: Elder Race and dragons combining power

cross_ref.name: War of Ten Thousand Years Ago

cinematics.name: Raven Spy Revealed
cinematics.camera_work: Crane shot pulling up from departing heroes to reveal shadow raven watching from ruins, zoom to raven's eye

cinematics.name: Crown Forge Ritual
cinematics.camera_work: Spiraling shot around ritual circle, upward crane as Dawn Blade strikes forge, blinding light explosion, slow-motion Kael transformation
phases: Vyrnax's prison shattering (cut to distant shot)

cinematics.name: Vyrnax's Sacrifice
cinematics.camera_work: Close-up on Vyrnax arriving, tracking shot as she reaches dying Zarathax, intimate two-shot during Rite of Eternal Bonding
cinematics.vfx: Life force transfers, flames merge and bind
cinematics.tears: Tears of fire rolling down Zarathax's scaled face
